cab.content: -__Britannic Majesty^ GovernrmSEC R^,BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 8th JUNE, 1918.1, The situation remains unchanged. Towards midnight 2 German attacks in the direction of BOURESOHES were repulsed by the French with heavy loss to the enemy. The French advanced their lino North of CHEZY taking 40 prisoners, and also South-east of AMBLENY.20 On the British Front there is nothing of interest to reports,L ... X. fGeneral Staff,War Office, S.W.1. 8 th June^, "1918.Issued at 6,40 p9m.
